block.p: Kathleen Anne Buckley, a daughter of Mary and Patrick Buckley of Larchmont, N.Y., was married yesterday to Christian David Bennett, a son of Simone Bennett and David Bennett, both of Melbourne, Australia. The Rev. Paul McCarren performed the ceremony at Epiphany Roman Catholic Church in Washington.
Ms. Buckley, 29, is keeping her name. Until last month she was a senior account executive in the Washington office of Ogilvy Public Relations Worldwide. She graduated from American University.

Kathleen Anne Buckley, a daughter of Mary and Patrick Buckley of Larchmont, N.Y., was married yesterday to Christian David Bennett, a son of Simone Bennett and David Bennett, both of Melbourne, Australia. The Rev. Paul McCarren performed the ceremony at Epiphany Roman Catholic Church in Washington.
Ms. Buckley, 29, is keeping her name. Until last month she was a senior account executive in the Washington office of Ogilvy Public Relations Worldwide. She graduated from American University.

Mr. Bennett, 31, works in Australia's Embassy in Washington, where he is a first secretary in its political branch. Next month he is to return to Australia, where he will become an adviser in the international unit in the Department of the Prime Minister and Cabinet in Canberra. He graduated with bachelor's degrees in law and commerce from Melbourne University.
